departments.name: Administration
departments.brief: Coordinates records, transport, HR, ICT, finance & audit to support all departmental functions.
departments.details: Oversees programs, departmental administration, asset management, records, transport, HR development, ICT, finance, supply chain, and public communications.

departments.name: Division of Legal Affairs
departments.brief: Provides legal advice to government ministries on human rights, constitutional and anti-corruption matters.
departments.details: Advises MDAs on legal affairs, human rights, constitutional implementation, anti‑corruption policy and oversight on the regulation of the legal profession.

departments.name: International Law Division
departments.brief: Handles Kenya's international treaties, trade agreements, maritime law, and transnational legal disputes.
departments.details: Manages treaties as Kenya's Treaty Registry, provides legal advice on bilateral/regional law, represents Kenya in international arbitration and judicial cooperation.

departments.name: Advocates Complaints Commission
departments.brief: Receives and investigates complaints related to advocate misconduct.
departments.details: Established under the Advocates Act to receive and inquire into complaints against advocates, pending transformation into a semi-autonomous agency.

departments.name: Government Transactions Division
departments.brief: Legal advisor on public procurement, PPPs, project finance, and large-scale government contracts.
departments.details: Provides legal opinions related to Vision 2030 projects, PPPs, extractives, PPPs, finance agreements, infrastructure, and ICT contracts.

departments.name: Department of Justice
departments.brief: Leads constitutional policy, human rights oversight, access to justice and legal reforms.
departments.details: Advises on the Constitution, international law, human rights, consumer protection, legal aid, coordinates treaty reporting, and regulates the legal profession.

departments.name: Registrar General
departments.brief: Registers marriages, societies, coats of arms, adoptions, and newspapers.
departments.details: Registers civil, Christian, Hindu, societal bodies, adoptions, coats of arms, newspaper registrations, and manages marriage/divorce records.

departments.name: Legislative Drafting
departments.brief: Develops and vets legislative proposals and statutory instruments.
departments.details: Drafts legislation and advises government agencies on law-making processes.

departments.name: Legal Advisory & Research Division
departments.brief: Provides in-depth legal advisory, policy research, and statutory interpretation services.
departments.details: Conducts legal research and offers policy frameworks and advisory services across government on legislative matters.

departments.name: Civil Litigation
departments.brief: Represents the State in civil cases and constitutional litigation.
departments.details: Conducts civil litigations, alternative dispute resolutions, and defends the Republic in courts.

departments.name: Victim Protection Board
departments.brief: Provides victim rehabilitation, compensation, and protective services.
departments.details: Established under the Victim Protection Act to advise the Cabinet Secretary on victim rights and implement support programs.

departments.name: Public Trustee (Administrator General)
departments.brief: Handles estates, trusts, guardianships and public fiduciary services.
departments.details: Administers estates of persons without wills or executors, trusts, and public deposit management.

departments.name: National Legal Aid Service
departments.brief: Offers free legal representation to marginalized citizens.
departments.details: Provides legal assistance and representation to indigent individuals under constitutional rights.

departments.name: National Anti‑Corruption Campaign Steering Committee
departments.brief: Leads national anti-corruption advocacy and public education campaigns.
departments.details: Established by Gazette Notice to coordinate anti‑corruption awareness and prevention across the country.

departments.name: Governance, Justice, Law & Order Sector (GJLOS)
departments.brief: Coordinates justice sector reforms across governance and security institutions.
departments.details: Brings together justice and security agencies to implement sector-wide reforms and ensure rule of law.

departments.name: Criminal Justice Division
departments.brief: Oversees criminal prosecutions and coordinates with law enforcement agencies.
departments.details: Manages criminal justice policy, prosecution guidelines, and coordinates with DPP and police services.

departments.name: Constitutional Affairs Division
departments.brief: Monitors constitutional implementation and provides constitutional interpretation.
departments.details: Ensures constitutional compliance across government and provides guidance on constitutional matters.

departments.name: Human Rights Division
departments.brief: Promotes and protects human rights through policy and legal frameworks.
departments.details: Develops human rights policy, monitors compliance, and coordinates with international human rights bodies.

departments.name: Commercial Law Division
departments.brief: Provides legal advice on commercial transactions and business regulations.
departments.details: Advises on commercial law, business regulations, and supports economic development through legal frameworks.

departments.name: Environmental Law Division
departments.brief: Handles environmental litigation and policy development.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on environmental matters, climate change, and natural resource management.

departments.name: Family Law Division
departments.brief: Manages family law matters, child protection, and domestic relations.
departments.details: Handles family law policy, child welfare, adoption procedures, and domestic violence legal frameworks.

departments.name: Immigration Law Division
departments.brief: Provides legal guidance on immigration, citizenship, and refugee matters.
departments.details: Advises on immigration policy, citizenship applications, and refugee protection frameworks.

departments.name: Intellectual Property Division
departments.brief: Protects intellectual property rights and manages IP policy.
departments.details: Handles intellectual property law, patents, trademarks, and copyright protection policies.

departments.name: Labor Law Division
departments.brief: Oversees employment law, labor relations, and workplace rights.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on labor law, employment disputes, and workplace safety regulations.

departments.name: Tax Law Division
departments.brief: Handles tax policy, revenue law, and fiscal legal matters.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on taxation, revenue collection, and fiscal policy implementation.

departments.name: Public Health Law Division
departments.brief: Manages health law policy, medical regulations, and public health legal frameworks.
departments.details: Advises on health law, medical practice regulations, and public health emergency legal frameworks.

departments.name: Education Law Division
departments.brief: Handles education policy, institutional law, and academic legal matters.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on education policy, institutional governance, and academic freedom.

departments.name: Land Law Division
departments.brief: Manages land law, property rights, and land administration legal frameworks.
departments.details: Handles land law policy, property disputes, and land administration legal guidance.

departments.name: Energy Law Division
departments.brief: Provides legal advice on energy policy, regulations, and sector governance.
departments.details: Handles energy law, renewable energy policy, and energy sector regulatory frameworks.

departments.name: Transport Law Division
departments.brief: Manages transport law, aviation regulations, and infrastructure legal matters.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on transport policy, aviation law, and infrastructure development.

departments.name: Information Technology Law Division
departments.brief: Handles cyber law, data protection, and digital governance legal frameworks.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on cyber security, data protection, and digital transformation policies.

departments.name: Financial Services Law Division
departments.brief: Manages banking law, financial regulations, and capital markets legal frameworks.
departments.details: Handles financial services law, banking regulations, and capital markets legal guidance.

departments.name: Public Procurement Law Division
departments.brief: Oversees procurement law, tender regulations, and public contracting legal frameworks.
departments.details: Provides legal advice on public procurement, tender processes, and government contracting.
